title: New: Oyinda – The Devil’s Gonna Keep Me
content: Oyinda’s What Still Remains endures as one of my favourite singles of 2014; powerful vocals, an intricate storytelling ability and an ear for a killer hook showcase exactly why she’s one of this years finest new artists. Her latest single, and third available track, The Devil’s Gonna Keep Me, is another example of her spellbinding poetic nature – “I hear a whisper as the silence spoke / the devil’s gonna keep me“. Another self-produced number, it’s further indication that 2015 is already shaping up to be rather special for Oyinda. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
